name: Cosmic Cooking
description:
“After being fired from her restaurant job, a girl dreaming to be a master chef travels across the galaxy in search of out-of-this-world recipes to open her own restaurant.”

                       

Cosmic Cooking is a 2D sci-fi simulation game that follows the life of an intergalactic chef, Margo. Follow her on her journey as she learns out of this world recipes, explore new dimensions, and become the greatest chef in the universe. Explore Mars while creating unique, weird, and wacky dishes. Each recipe has a rating system to evaluate your culinary success. Start off as a beginner student and challenge yourself to become a master. Each dish involves different steps; for example, laser cutting food, cooking with an anti gravity pressure cooker, and more all  while using utensils and ingredients not native to earth. Finish your tasks within the time constraint to move on! As Margo you get to  make choices in the story that will effect how she develops as a character. Follow her captivating story as she struggles to make it on a new planet and learns the true history of mars.

Do you have what it takes to become a master chef? Download now below!
